title: Tashi and the Monk
fullplot: On a journey to transform his suffering into light a man creates a remarkable children's community based on principles of love and compassion, but struggles with the unexpectedly dark forces unleashed in the process. A troubled 5 year old girl joins the community and stretches the limits of its capacity for healing.
